islands.footer: Developed by {author}. The source code is available on {github}.

toast.description: This project is open source and free to use. ü•≥
toast.title: It's free! üòú

landing.about: We aim to create the world's most feature-rich, global, and iconic Next.js starter. Explore the comprehensive list of features. Offering more than just code, it's a journey. It's stable and ready for production.

clock.description: Maintain peak performance with Drizzle ORM, by switching MySQL and Postgres on-the-fly. Enjoy flexible deployment options, including Planetscale, Vercel, Railway, Neon, and more.
clock.title: Database Integration: Robust and Versatile

cryptography.description: Experience seamless navigation with advanced features like App Router, Layouts, and Loading UI. Leverage powerful API routes and explore innovative capabilities beyond the basics.
cryptography.title: Next.js 14: Enhanced User Experience & DX

currency.description: Craft stunning UI with components built on top of Radix and Shadcn UI, beautifully styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern aesthetic. VSCode is recommended for a full immersion experience.
currency.title: Components: Elegant & Functional

devtools.description: Implemented a robust subscription system, both free and paid plans are supported, optimized for efficiency and scalability. Learn README.md of the project to learn more.
devtools.title: Stripe Subscriptions: Powerful & Flexible
devtools.ambitions-description: Stop running from one starter to the next. With Relivator, you'll have unlimited possibilities. You can create anything you want; all the tools are already prepared, just for you.

files.description: Deploy a versatile authentication system using NextAuth.js and Clerk, tailored for your application‚Äôs needs. Learn more in .env.example file, and you're ready to go.
files.title: User Authentication: Secure & Conditional
files.on-the-fly-description: Dive into an extensive list of features in our project repository. Effortlessly switch between Clerk/NextAuth.js and MySQL/PostgreSQL to suit your project requirements.

features.subtitle: From code to design, Relivator has functionalities that supercharge your web projects.

text.description: Effortlessly manipulate your app with both Server and Client Components. Utilize advanced hooks and explore a range of additional features for a smoother development experience.
text.title: React 18: Streamlined Modern Development

features.title: Features

landing.heading: Build More Efficient, Engaging, and Profitable Online Stores: Relivator Empowers Your eCommerce with the Power of Next.js

hero.description: Join the Relivator community. Choose the plan that suits you best.

questions.answer-card: A la carte pricing allows you to customize your plan based on your specific needs. You only pay for the features you need.
questions.answer-change: Yes, you can change plans at any time.
questions.answer-free: Yes, Relivator offers a free plan with a basic feature set. You can use it free of charge.
questions.answer-limits: If you exceed your plan limits, you can either upgrade your plan to get more resources or pay additional fees based on your excess usage.
questions.answer-nonprofit: Yes, we offer discounts for nonprofits and educational institutions. Contact us for more details.
questions.answer-payment: We accept credit card payments and secure online payments. You can also choose to pay monthly or annually.
questions.answer-teams: Pricing for teams is based on the number of team members. You can add or remove team members at any time, and your billing will be adjusted accordingly.
questions.are-prices: Are the prices monthly or yearly?
questions.do-you-offer: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits or educational institutions?
questions.how-does: How does √† la carte pricing work?
questions.how-is: How is pricing calculated for teams?
questions.is-there: Is there a free version of Relivator?
questions.what-happens: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
questions.what-payment: What payment methods do you accept?
